## HandlerService interface

The HandlerService provides the assistant application's dialog management with logic and content in the form of a [Handler](./stentor-models.handler.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HandlerService 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [get(id)](./stentor-models.handlerservice.get.md) | Returns the handler for the provided ID or undefined if not found. |
